messages.title: THE FACTS
messages.content: Nicola Sturgeon has said she will count every vote for her at this election as a vote for another independence referendum – and she says she wants to hold that referendum as early as next year. SNP election win would be 'instruction' for indyref2, says Sturgeon.
Jeremy Corbyn has said he won't stand in the way of another independence referendum and the LibDem leader has refused to rule out working with Labour. Corbyn could back new indyref 'as early as 2021'

So it’s clear - everyone who wants to stop another independence referendum being held needs to lend their vote to the Scottish Conservatives at this election. There’s no other way to stop Indyref2 - and this could be our last chance.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Scottish Conservatives aim to stop the second independence referendum (Indyref2). They believe that this election is the last chance to prevent it.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Nicola Sturgeon, Jeremy Corbyn, LibDem leader
mentions.tacticalSituation: everyone who wants to stop another independence referendum being held needs to lend their vote to the Scottish Conservatives at this election. There’s no other way to stop Indyref2

quotes.text: SNP election win would be 'instruction' for indyref2, says Sturgeon.
Corbyn could back new indyref 'as early as 2021'.

images.caption: Photo of opposing candidates and an image that says 'MAKE HER LISTEN! STOP INDYREF2'

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet is delivered by Royal Mail and has the tracking code 'C9 10077'.
